## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution.

## Use Case
How would this feature be used in emergency scenarios?

## Alternatives Considered
What other solutions have you considered?

## Additional Context
- Mockups, diagrams, or examples
- Related issues or PRs
- Relevant documentation

---

### Priority Assessment

Does this feature:
- [ ] Improve security
- [ ] Enable offline functionality
- [ ] Help during actual emergencies
- [ ] Make the app more accessible

*Features that check more boxes may be prioritized higher.*
